## Container.mutate() method

Mutate a repository item

Signature:

```typescript
mutate(key: string, mutationFn: (value?: any) => any): this;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter  | Type                    | Description                              |
| ---------- | ----------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| key        | string                  | The key of the item to mutate            |
| mutationFn | (value?: any) =&gt; any | The mutation function to run on the item |

Returns:

this

## Example

```js
container.mutate("key", (currentValue) => modifiedValue);
```
